comments:
Selecting a class (or multiple classes) in the package explorer view
and invoking the method refactor/move i get the following stack dump in the 
java console window:

!ENTRY org.vssplugin 4 0 nov 26, 2002 09:00:39.907

!ENTRY org.vssplugin 1 0 nov 26, 2002 09:00:39.907
!MESSAGE OutReader is going down

The start of the stack trace contains code from the Visual Source Safe plugin 
which isn't an official Eclipse plug-in. Moving to Platform UI anyway to check 
if the somehow can guard against this in ProgressBar.getSelection or if this 
has to be fixed by the provider of the VSS plug-in.

Any updates to a ProgressMonitor have to be done within the UI Thread - this 
is an SWT requirement of all widgets.

The best we could do would be to dump the result to the log and do nothing - 
this is not only really hard to trace it would only encourage developers into 
writing dangerous code.
